title: Moneyline Monaco - Action Network’s Raheem Palmer deep dive on NBA betting process & favorite FUTURES
itunes:title: Moneyline Monaco - Action Network’s Raheem Palmer deep dive on NBA betting process & favorite FUTURES
description:
With the NBA Season on pause, I spoke to the Action Network's Raheem Palmer about the best way to make YOU money in the second half of the year!. Follow MoneylineMonaco and The Volume on Twitter to stay locked into Monaco's latest picks, tips and content.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
